problems_addressed.specific_problem: How to be seen as a thought leader
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Position yourself as an expert by identifying a niche, creating relevant content, and actively seeking speaking opportunities.

episode_summary: Kim Rittberg shares strategies for real estate agents to become thought leaders by leveraging video marketing and public speaking opportunities. She emphasizes the importance of identifying a niche, creating relevant content, and preparing thoroughly for every opportunity to establish oneself as an expert in the field.
